# description

**Instance Property**

A text representation of the data table.

## Declaration

```swift
var description: String { get }
```

## Describing a data table

- **playgroundDescription**: A description of the data table shown in a playground.

items.description: A description of the data table shown in a playground.
items.name: playgroundDescription
